description:
**Kate Heddleston** , Shift

`**Technical Debt in Python** <http://pycon.ru/2018/en/program/content/kate/>`__

Technical debt is something that every team has to deal with at some
point; often sooner than you'd think. This talk is about what is
technical debt, what specifically does it look in python, and how can
you think about reducing technical debt.
title: Technical Debt in Python
